title: Drone Strike, Congress Reaction, 2020
itunes:title: Drone Strike, Congress Reaction, 2020
description:
Panel Guests: Max Burns, Democratic Strategist and Contributor at The Daily Beast and The Independent and Lester Munson, Principal at government relations firm, BGR Group and Adjunct Faculty Member at Johns Hopkins University.


Guest host June Grasso also spoke with John Gans, former Chief Speechwriter at the Pentagon and author of "White House Warriors: How the National Security Council Transformed the American Way of War" about the drone strike that killed Iran’s top military commander.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
